snippet: In a debt-reducing effort, the Republican-controlled legislature voted to cut maximum weekly benefits to $350 from $535, a 35 percent drop.
abstract: Republican-controlled North Carolina legislature, in debt-reducing effort, votes to cut maximum weekly unemployment benefits to $350 from $535, 35 percent drop, and reduce weeks for collecting benefits to between 12 and 20 weeks from 26 weeks.
lead_paragraph: In a debt-reducing effort, the Republican-controlled legislature voted to cut maximum weekly benefits to $350 from $535, a 35 percent drop.

headline.seo: North Carolina Approves Benefit Cuts for Unemployed
headline.main: North Carolina Approves Steep Benefit Cuts for Jobless in Bid to Reduce Debt
headline.print_headline: North Carolina Approves Steep Benefit Cuts for Jobless in Bid to Reduce Debt
